content.rendered:
• KVPY Exam date has been released
  • KVPY 2022 exam is scheduled to be conducted on May 22, 2022
  • All the concerned candidates can check the updated examination date on the official website at kvpy.iisc.ac.in

excerpt.rendered: Around one in 57 (1.76%) children in the UK is on the autistic spectrum, significantly higher than previously reported, according to a study of more than seven million children
